title: M1: Store Setup & Configuration
description: Initial admin setup, store configs, payment & shipping integration

title: M2: Product & Inventory Management
description: Product CRUD, digital uploads, inventory tracking & limited drops

title: M3: Orders & Invoices
description: Order management, invoice generation for AT/DE/CH, accounting exports

title: M4: Analytics & Profit Reporting
description: Sales analytics, profit calculations, reporting dashboard

title: M5: Customer Browsing & Accounts
description: Public storefront, user accounts, product filtering

title: M6: Cart & Checkout
description: Cart functionality, checkout flow, payment integration, pickup & digital delivery

title: M7: Post-Purchase & User Dashboard
description: Order history, invoice downloads, returns & support
